root.name: Digimon: Battle Spirit
root.description: OverviewThe digital world of Digimon is full of cool digital monsters and Digi-destined kids. The Digimon BattleSpirit video game for the Nintendo Gameboy Advance and SP puts you in control of your fave digital monster as it fights to prove that it's the strongest digital monster of all!The Digimon BattleSpirit game lets you choose from seven different Digimon to battle the other Digital Monsters and face the massive Millenniumon. Each Digimon has some fun moves, there are cool places to battle and a chance to Digivolve with some help from Culumon. Plus, you can unlock more Digimon to battle with and play two-player mode with a friend.
